author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Arundel Consolidated Net Loss Of $2.2 Mln For 9-Month Period Ending Dec 2017
text:
April 23 (Reuters) - ARUNDEL AG:
* 9-MONTH CONSOLIDATED NET LOSS OF $2.2 MILLION FOR PE DEC17 (NET LOSS OF $6.9 MILLION – YEAR ENDED 31 MARCH 2017)
* NO CAPITAL DISTRIBUTION IS PROPOSED FOR THE SHORTENED (9 MONTH) REPORTING PERIOD ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017
* 9-MONTH (PE DEC17) TOTAL REVENUE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS WAS $9.9 MILLION COMPARED TO $11.5 MILLION FOR FY ENDING MAR 17 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
